CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starlight Innovations relative to Vanguard Dynamics?
SRP.A: Starlight Innovations is {above} Vanguard Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Systems relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Apex Systems is {above} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to Apex Systems?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {below} Apex Systems in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Apex Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starlight Innovations}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apex Systems's maximum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apex Systems's maximum Market Share is in {1968}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Vanguard Dynamics's minimum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Vanguard Dynamics's minimum Market Share is in {1952}.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1965, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1963 and 1964?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1953 and 1965 was {lower} than between 1963 and 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1960, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1957 and 1967?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1952 and 1960 was {larger} than between 1957 and 1967.

NC.Q: Was the total Market Share in 1958 higher or lower than in 1964?
NC.A: The total market share in 1958 was {lower} than in 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1966, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1961 and 1965?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1964 and 1966 was {higher} than between 1961 and 1965.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Apex Systems} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Vanguard Dynamics and Starlight Innovations first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Vanguard Dynamics and Starlight Innovations first exchanged leading positions in {1953}.
